sentence.text: We chose to study protein transport-branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis rather than wild cardiac muscle tissue development branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis because unlike full length sema3E, the major p61-Sema3E peptide that is produced by cleavage of sema3E with signal peptide processing like pro-protein convertases activates signal transduction mediated by the signal transduction receptor and can promote tumor metastasis in addition to its anti-angiogenic activity.

entity.text: branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis
branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis
